data.text: @pittworldwide We had a presenter on UK breakfast TV say "but what of it *is* caused by 5G? I've not seen any evidence it isn't. We just don't know enough!" Omg
@pittworldwide This was when the lockdowns first came in. A lot of unemployed people due to businesses forced to close.
@pittworldwide Nobody thought that Ed take your schizo pills

@pittworldwide ❤️
I can't wait to get off. 😏
@pittworldwide True, I feel for the link workers though who'll be getting a whole load of just ugh from them.
@Krislicked I was on and off it my whole 20s!

@Krislicked I think after the last few years you need to cut yourself some slack ❤️❤️❤️

I was gonna say the 5G nuts don’t deserve the link - but they deserve the suffering it! 😂
@pittworldwide Been stuck with the link for more years than I'd like to admit now. It's not fun, hoping to cut it off soon.

@Krislicked Oh gawd having to deal with the link?

Takes me back to very dark memories!!
@pittworldwide They're not welcome in my living hell.
